hero.heading: Welding. Machining. Milling.
hero.question: What we Do
hero.answer: we specialize in making precise steel parts, as well as metal processing in Poland.

about.heading: Welcome to Metana
about.paragraph: We specialize in the production of intricate and precise steel constructions, as well as metal processing in the Silesian region. Our expertise serves leading manufacturers in the electro-energy, automotive, and machinery industries. With a legacy dating back to 1994, started by P.P.H.U. METANA and P.P.H.U. METANA S.C. We have been a reliable presence in both national and international markets.

first.question: Are you hiring?
first.answer: Yes, we are actively looking for qualified individuals to join our team as CNC programmers & operators, manual lathe operators, and production workers. If you have the skills and experience for any of these positions, we encourage you to explore the opportunities available on our career page and submit your application. We look forward to potentially welcoming you to our company.
